Mod.Name: No Fall Damage
Mod.Author: Camo
Mod.Description: You will no longer take any fall damage. All other damage is still received.

Tweak_Table_Entry.Name: Player_safe_fall_speed
Tweak_Table_Entry.Description: Falling speed below which the player does not take damage.

Tweak_Table_Entry.Name: Player_fatal_fall_speed
Tweak_Table_Entry.Description: Falling speed at which a player dies on impact.
